page.title: 01INTRODUCING KNUTSFORD
page.content: Knutsford is a Cheshire Market Town, population 14,000. The town is surrounded by rich farmland and is bordered to the north by Tatton Park. It is close to the M6, and is on the Chester - Manchester railway line and close to Manchester Airport. Many of Knutsford's residents are commuters but it is also a centre for people who work in local industries, including Banking, Chemicals, Computers, Nuclear Energy Planning and Holidays. There are several primary schools, and one large comprehensive school. The town is a historic place and a centre of tourism. Architecture is unique, and the town centre remains unspoiled. There are many good restaurants and leisure facilities, not the least of which is the magnificent Tatton Park.
